issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports protecting and expanding the Affordable Care Act, lowering prescription drug costs, and protecting coverage for pre-existing conditions

issues.title: Economic Development
issues.description: Advocates for middle-class job creation, infrastructure investment, and support for manufacturing and small businesses

issues.title: Veterans Support
issues.description: Strong supporter of veterans' healthcare, mental health services, and job training programs

issues.title: Climate Change Action
issues.description: Supports clean energy initiatives, reducing carbon emissions, and investing in renewable energy infrastructure

issues.title: Gun Safety Reform
issues.description: Advocates for universal background checks, closing gun show loopholes, and responsible gun ownership legislation

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform, border security, and path to citizenship for qualified immigrants

issues.title: Education Investment
issues.description: Supports increased funding for public education, student debt relief, and workforce training programs

issues.title: Foreign Policy
issues.description: Emphasizes strong national security, support for NATO allies, and diplomatic approaches to international challenges

top_companies.name: Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America
